provident fund.text: Please refer following instructions to check your PF ePass book online on EPFO website under your UAN.

You can check your “Past Accumulation PF Amount” with interest on EPFO portal under your UAN passbook (If your Adobe date of joining is before of 01/11/2021) there you will find an entry of transferred PF amount along with your PF Account (MRNOI/20265000XXXXX) on November 01, 2021
Statement and verify your Past Accumulation amount transferred from Adobe Systems Employees Provident Fund to RPFC Noida, Uttar Pradesh (If your Adobe date of joining is before November 01, 2021).
Adobe India has surrendered Employee PF Trust to EPFO, NOIDA w.e.f November 01, 2021
You can access DKM Portal through SSO login to view your PF
Their PF/EPS contribution is being remitted directly with EPFO on monthly basis.
Go to the last page there you will see your transferred / credited PF amount.
Please follow the following process to apply PF advance online.

When the Adobe trust was surrendered on dated 31/10/2021, we transferred all PF balances with interest till the 31/10/2021, EPFO will provide the interest from 01/11/2021 and will update under your UAN passbook on yearly basis.
Adobe Trust and EPFO provides the same rate of interest.
Yes, you can apply for PF advance as per EPFO guidelines available at EPFO portal.
Yes, please refer following instruction to initiate online transfer of provident fund balance from previous employer to present employer.
Alternatively, submit your query/grievances at EPFO portal to know your interest credit status from November 01, 2021 onwards.

finance.text: Please refer following instructions to check your PF ePass book online on EPFO website under your UAN.

You can check your “Past Accumulation PF Amount” with interest on EPFO portal under your UAN passbook (If your Adobe date of joining is before of 01/11/2021) there you will find an entry of transferred PF amount along with your PF Account (MRNOI/20265000XXXXX) on November 01, 2021
Statement and verify your Past Accumulation amount transferred from Adobe Systems Employees Provident Fund to RPFC Noida, Uttar Pradesh (If your Adobe date of joining is before November 01, 2021).
Adobe India has surrendered Employee PF Trust to EPFO, NOIDA w.e.f November 01, 2021
You can access DKM Portal through SSO login to view your PF
Their PF/EPS contribution is being remitted directly with EPFO on monthly basis.
Interest calculation of past accumulated balance can be checked at DKM Portal for FY 2021-22.
Adobe Trust and EPFO provides the same rate of interest.

When the Adobe trust was surrendered on dated 31/10/2021, we transferred all PF balances with interest till the 31/10/2021, EPFO will provide the interest from 01/11/2021 and will update under your UAN passbook on yearly basis.
Yes, you can apply for PF advance as per EPFO guidelines available at EPFO portal.
There would be no impact as the interest rate is always declared by the Govt.
Alternatively, submit your query/grievances at EPFO portal to know your interest credit status from November 01, 2021 onwards.
The interest is calculated on monthly basis, Interest is updated once a year on March 31 and published by government of India.

Generic Highlights.text: You can check your “Past Accumulation PF Amount” with interest on EPFO portal under your UAN passbook (If your Adobe date of joining is before of 01/11/2021) there you will find an entry of transferred PF amount along with your PF Account (MRNOI/20265000XXXXX) on November 01, 2021
Adobe India has surrendered Employee PF Trust to EPFO, NOIDA w.e.f November 01, 2021
You can access DKM Portal through SSO login to view your PF
There is no change for employees who have joined post November 01, 2021.
Select Your Adobe member ID which would be started as “MRNOI0030265000XXXXXXX”
Yes, you can apply for PF advance as per EPFO guidelines available at EPFO portal.
Yes, please refer following instruction to initiate online transfer of provident fund balance from previous employer to present employer.
Click on “get OTP” to get pin on your register mobile no.
& submit the same to close the process

Question 1.question: do I need to take any action?
Question 1.statement: Without further context or information, it is difficult to determine if any specific action needs to be taken. In general, if there is a specific task or request that needs to be accomplished, there will likely be more detailed instructions or information provided beyond the limited information found in these sources. However, if there is uncertainty or confusion about a specific task or process, it may be helpful to review the sources provided to see if they contain relevant information that can provide guidance or clarification.

Question 2.question: when will the migration complete?
Question 2.statement: There is no clear answer to when the migration will complete as there are multiple sources referring to different aspects such as monthly contributions being remitted directly to UAN from November 01, 2021 (1), no change for employees who have joined post this date (2), change only for employees joined before November 01, 2021 (3), employees can verify their past accumulation amount transferred to RPFC Noida from Adobe Systems Employees Provident Fund (5) and EPFO will provide the interest from 01/11/2021 and will update under UAN passbook on a yearly basis (6). Additionally, employees can check their past accumulation PF amount with interest on the EPFO portal under the UAN passbook (7). However, there is no specific information available about the completion date of migration.

Your monthly contribution is remitted directly to your UAN from November 01, 2021 onwards.
This change is only for employees joined before November 01, 2021

Their PF/EPS contribution is being remitted directly with EPFO on monthly basis.

When the Adobe trust was surrendered on dated 31/10/2021, we transferred all PF balances with interest till the 31/10/2021, EPFO will provide the interest from 01/11/2021 and will update under your UAN passbook on yearly basis.
Alternatively, submit your query/grievances at EPFO portal to know your interest credit status from November 01, 2021 onwards.
Immediately before migration from India for permanent settlement abroad or for taking employment abroad

Question 3.question: who should I contact for any questions?
Question 3.statement: For any questions, one should visit the website mentioned in sources 7 and 8 or get in touch with the relevant company's PF number, as mentioned in source 0. No other relevant information is provided in the sources.
